isOtherLand.title: Have you purchased other land or properties other than dwellings?
isOtherLand.description: This would include any other land or properties bought as part of this purchase, but would not include any garden or grounds of the dwellings.

validation.invalidOption: Select an other land or properties option.

considerationOtherLand.title: How much of the purchase price paid was for other land or properties?
considerationOtherLand.description: This is the total amount paid less any amount paid for dwellings as part of this purchase.
considerationOtherLand.hint: Enter whole numbers only, do not include decimal points.

validation.aboveMax: The purchase price must not exceed £999,999,999,999

otherLandType.title: What type of other land have you purchased?
otherLandType.description: Select what type of other land is being purchased with the dwellings.

validation.invalidOption: Select a type of other land.

transactionRate.title: Will you need to pay the higher rate?
transactionRate.descriptionOne: If you're an individual it's expected that the higher rates will apply to a purchase where there's more than one dwelling, unless the purchase is of mixed use or the subsidiary dwelling exception at
transactionRate.descriptionThree: If you're a company, the higher rates will apply unless the purchase is of mixed use.
transactionRate.validation: Select a higher rates residential option.

transactionDate.title: What is the effective date?
transactionDate.description: This is usually the completion date. We use the rates and bands on this date for the calculation.
transactionDate.checkbox: Use today's date for a tax estimate if you do not know the date yet

validation.invalidDate: Enter a valid date. The expected format is DD/MM/YYYY, leading zeros must be used if applicable.
validation.preLtt: This date must not be before 1 April 2018. Land Transaction Tax replaced Stamp Duty Land Tax in Wales from 1 April 2018.

considerationDwellings.title: How much of the purchase price paid was for the dwellings?
considerationDwellings.description: This is the total amount paid less any amount paid for other land or properties that are not considered dwellings as part of this purchase.
considerationDwellings.hint: Enter whole numbers only, do not include decimal points.

validation.aboveMax: The purchase price must not exceed £999,999,999,999

numberOfDwellings.title: How many dwellings have you purchased?
numberOfDwellings.description: This is the total number of dwellings bought as part of this purchase.

validation.belowMin: The number must not be less than 2

taxCalculation.title: Tax calculation
taxCalculation.description: Land Transaction Tax (LTT) is a self-assessed tax and therefore the Welsh Revenue Authority does not accept liability for the use by taxpayers or agents of this calculator.

calcBreakdown.title: Detailed calculation
calcBreakdown.description: This is a breakdown of how the total amount of tax was calculated.

explanation.pricePerDwelling: The purchase price paid for the dwellings divided by the number of dwellings is
explanation.breakdownTable: The table below shows a breakdown of the
explanation.oneDwelling: The 'tax due per dwelling' amount above is the tax due for 1 dwelling.
explanation.taxDueOnDwellings: total tax due on the dwellings is
explanation.lessThanOnePercent: Your 'tax due per dwelling' multiplied by the number of dwellings is less than 1% of the purchase price paid for the dwellings
explanation.payOnePercent: you must pay 1% of the purchase price paid for the dwellings

rowDescriptions.basedOnOtherLand: Tax based on the other land

calcBreakdown.taxDueTotalPurchasePrice: Tax due on total purchase price:
calcBreakdown.subTotalCalcDescr: This is a breakdown of all subtotal calculations.

payLtt.textP1: If you buy these properties it's your responsibility to make sure you

feedback.text: Tell us what you think of this calculator
